RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foal s Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIONA trailed for four and one half furlongs, circled rivals four then thee wide through the turn, made the lead at the quarter pole, battled until deep stretch and shook clear late under strong right handed urging. MORE MUCHO prompted the pace two wide into the far turn, drew on even terms for the lead at the quarter pole, battled until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. MANGORITA saved ground for six furlongs, altered course to the six path entering the stretch and finished with good courage. UNESCORTED away alertly, set the pace along the inside for six furlongs, checked past the quarter pole, altered course to the five path then was outfinished. SEMIRAMIS broke slowly, was hustled along then wen evenly. VAVITE with the second flight two wide, faded in the stretch. THE RIDER OF UNESCORTED LODGED A CLAIM OF FOUL AGAINST THE RIDER OF MORE MUCHO FOR ALLEGED INTERFERENCE NEAR THE QUARTER POLE, AFTER REVIEW THE STEWARDS UPHELD THE ORIGINAL ORDER OF FINISH.

ENTRY.NAME: Mangorita
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground 1/4 pole, altered course 6path, finished well,

ENTRY.NAME: Semiramis
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, hustled along, evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Unescorted
ENTRY.OWNER: Mace Ed and Urieta's Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace inside, steadied 1/4 pole, claimed foul

ENTRY.NAME: Fiona
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, circled 4-3wide, edged clear, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: More Mucho
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drew even 1/4 pole, battled, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 69. Maiden Claiming Purse 13100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MY TWO AUNT JOANS never far back, closed willingly four wide into the stretch, engage the frontrunner at the furlong marker, matched strides to the wire and proved best by the narrowest of margins under a strong hand ride. BLAST THE MUSIC pressed the pace two wide for a half, made the lead, battled through the final furlong with the winner but just failed despite a game effort. BON DEUX pressed the pace three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. ASK THE UMPIRE away alertly, set a pressured pace along the rail for a half, had speed until deep stretch then weakened. BAY DEFENSE failed to menace. BUILT LIKE TARZAN was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Aunt Joans
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, battled late, all out

ENTRY.NAME: Ask the Umpire
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Built Like Tarzan
ENTRY.COMMENT: through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Bay Defense
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Blast the Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, led, dug in gamely, just failed,

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Deux
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 57. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $ 12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EXPRESS FASHION chased the pace two wide into the stretch, responded readily when set down in the five path, made the lead at the furlong marker and drew clear under strong handling. GO GIRL away alertly, set the pace until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner but gamely held on for second. KETTLE KISS never far back, finished with good courage in the three path. DEW IT WITH STYLE was bumped at the start, chased the pace along the rail and went evenly. BEAUTIFUL LASS broke slowly, was quickly taken outside, drifted out past the middle of the racetrack entering the stretch and failed to menace. TV TIZ GORGEOUS bumped at the start, was well placed then lacked the needed response. SURE FIRE READY drifted out bumping rivals a few strides out of the gate then trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Beautiful Lass
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, wide trip, drifted very wide stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Sure Fire Ready
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out, bumped start, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Dew It With Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, chased, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Tv Tiz Gorgeous
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Go Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, held place,

ENTRY.NAME: Express Fashion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, responded 5path, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Kettle Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well 3path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLUNDER saved ground from the start, got through along the rail to make the lead nearing the quarter pole, drifted to the five path, edged clear and prevailed under strong handling. C C'S CLEAR CREEK away alertly, set the pace in the two and three paths for nearly six furlongs, gave up some ground to the winner in upper stretch while drifting to the six path then came on again late in a game effort. KNIGHTLY MISCHIEF pressed the pace two wide into the stretch, drifted out to the eight path and finished determinedly. ONE FOR THE MONEY unhurried early, swung wide and finished with good courage in the eight path. INSACIABLE PRINCE allowed to settle, swung wide and was no threat. NAPA DUDE vied for the lead three wide into the far turn then gradually weakened. STREET TRAFFIC had good early speed along the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Insaciable Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung wide, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Blunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, got through inside 1/4 pole, edged clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Street Traffic
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: C C's Clear Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace 2-3paths 1/4 pole, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Knightly Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted lane, determinedly

ENTRY.NAME: One for the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, finished well 8path

ENTRY.NAME: Napa Dude
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, weakened 2nd turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES SINCE MAY 6, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 6 A llowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FUEGO CALIENTE prompted the pace three wide into the far turn, responded under right handed urging to make the lead before the quarter pole, shook clear before mid stretch and prevailed under brisk handling. CUMBER set a pressured pace along the rail into the far turn, dropped back and altered course outside the winner to the four path before the eighth pole then finished second best. GILES close up from the start, raced in the four path on the far turn, drifted out to the six path then finished evenly. UNIDENTIFIED MAN pressed the pace two wide for six furlongs then faded. MASTER OF WAR failed to menace. DUEL FUEL bumped at the start and was no threat. OPEN OUT bumped at the start and failed to respond. ROSAS WAY showed little. SHELL FIRE had speed for a half, stopped, was eased to the wire, bled from the nostrils and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Cumber
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, altered course 4path 1/8pole, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Giles
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 4path 2nd turn, evenly 6path lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shell Fire
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed half, stopped, eased to wire, bled, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Duel Fuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Open Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Rosas Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed little,

ENTRY.NAME: Unidentified Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Master of War
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Fuego Caliente
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, took charge 2nd turn, drew clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 48. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $ 12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FABULOUS CLOWN chased the pace along the inside into the stretch, angled off the rail near the furlong marker, surged in the six path under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. KISS VALENTINA broke in front, set all the pace, widened into the stretch, drifted out to the five path under left handed urging then couldn't hold off the winner. SECRETS UNTOLD unhurried early, was steadily gaining ground late outside rivals. STARLITESLEW failed to menace. CHILLVILLE had speed through the turn then wilted. ANIMO STAR was never close.

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, angled out late, up in final strides, 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Starliteslew
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Chillville
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed turn, wilted

ENTRY.NAME: Animo Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

ENTRY.NAME: Kiss Valentina
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, shook clear, drifted out 5path, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Secrets Untold
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, late gain 7path

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Michael F. Rowland Memorial S. THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 92. Stakes Purse 75000. FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS (WHICH REFLECTS $26,250 FROM THE OHIO THOROUGHBRED FUND). Foaled in the State of Ohio as per requirements set forth by the Ohio State Racing Commission. Nomination fee is $50. $262 to enter with an addi tional $488 to start, with a purse of $75,000, of which 60% to winner, 20% to second, 10% to third, 5% to fourth, 3% to fifth, 2% to sixth. Nominations Closed Wednesday, April 27th, 2022 with 15 Nominations. Weights: Three-year-olds 119 lbs; Older 123 lbs . Non-Winners of $30,000 Twice in 2022-2023 allowed 2 lbs; A Race other Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since November 6th, 2022 allowed 4 lbs; A Race other Maiden, Claiming, Optional or Starter since May 6th, 2022 allowed 6 lbs. Starters to be name d through the entry box Monday, May 1st, 2022. A Trophy will be presented to the Winning Owner. This stake will not split. In the event more than fourteen (14) horses pass the entry box at the time of closing of entries, preference will be given to thoseh
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOESTER unhurried early, closed willingly five wide through the stretch and got up in the final strides. MIDNIGHT MIKEY stalked the pace into the stretch, drew on even terms for the lead four wide at the furlong marker and just missed in a game effort. AUTHENTIC COWTOWN forwardly placed from the start, saved ground through the turn, loomed boldly three wide before the furlong marker and was outfinished in a determined effort. RELISH THE RIDE slow early, found his best stride late seven wide. BIG TRUCK allowed to settle, closed a gap late eight wide. PAT'S KARMA raced wide and went evenly. SHANGHAI PRINCE had speed into the turn then faded. CALBOYZEKE was no factor. THEDAYOFTHEGREY made the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace until mid stretch then weakened. FIRSTHAND JUSTICE was no threat. MOBIL SOLUTION was outrun. ZAKARIA matched stride for the lead two wide until the furlong marker then folded.

ENTRY.NAME: Thedayofthegrey
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C and Wilkinson Richard M
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Authentic Cowtown
ENTRY.OWNER: McDonald James H and Authentic Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, rail turn, loomed boldly 3 wide, outfinished gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Calboyzeke
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Zakaria
ENTRY.COMMENT: battled 2 wide, stopped final furlong

ENTRY.NAME: Big Truck
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late gain 8wide

ENTRY.NAME: Firsthand Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Relish the Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, best stride late 7wide

ENTRY.NAME: Shanghai Prince
ENTRY.OWNER: Cline Robert C Reed Stephen and Sugar John J
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, faded turn

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil Solution
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Mikey
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, drew even between horses 4wide, just missed

ENTRY.NAME: Pat's Karma
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, evenly

ENTRY.NAME: Moester
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 5 wide, up in final strides,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RADIANTRITHYM hopped at the start, settled with the second flight between horses two wide, responded with a rapid move three wide to make the lead at the top of the stretch and finished full of run to win going away. BACKSPLASH trailed along the inside into the stretch, angled out to the five path and rallied for second. DIVINE MARTHA rushed to contention outside, pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. PRINCESS HALIME with the second flight three wide went evenly. SHELLEY'S GEM sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace to the top of the stretch then weakened late. MISS OVER THERE with the second flight inside, lacked the needed response.

ENTRY.NAME: Backsplash
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed inside, altered course 5path, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Over There
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, quick move, 3 wide, full of run, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention outside, pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 9 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $ 12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ANCHORWOMAN bore out at the start bumping rivals, sped to the lead, set all the pace and winded through the stretch under strong handling to win as much the best. HELLO SWEETS never far back, rallied through the stretch four wide and got up for second. NEECHI stalked the early pace, offered a bid three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. TRULY INCLUSIVE vied for the lead along the inside and faded in the stretch. BROWNIE passed tiring rivals. MISS ELLIE chased the winner two wide and weakened late. MARGARITA CINCO was bumped at the start, checked repeatedly along the rail into the turn and finished evenly. COSTUME JEWELRY also bumped at the start, was no threat. BIRDIE'S CHANTZ was bumped by the winner at the start then no factor. MACHEN REIGNS was outrun. TALE OF THE LYON bore in at the start bumping rivals and was through early.

ENTRY.NAME: Truly Inclusive
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Machen Reigns
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Anchorwoman
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore out, bumped start, set pace, full of run, much the best,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC & WinStarFarm, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Birdie's Chantz
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Margarita Cinco
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, checked repeatedly rail turn

ENTRY.NAME: Costume Jewelry
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Tale of the Lyon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in, bumped start, through early,

ENTRY.NAME: Brownie
ENTRY.OWNER: Spicer, Richard and Spitler, D. William
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Neechi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Hello Sweets
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, late rally, 4 wide, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Ellie
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 2 wide, weakened late
